data.title: About Harrison Senior Living, Skilled Nursing & Assisted Living Communities
data.meta_description: Harrison Senior Living has the programs, personnel and facilities that encourage the highest level of independence for our residents.
data.text:
James and Katherine Harrison founded Harrison Senior Living in 1967 with the purchase of 17.5 beautiful acres of farmland in Christiana, PA. They knew it was the perfect location to build a skilled nursing facility where they could dedicate themselves to promoting and advancing the betterment of senior care facilities in a family like setting.

In 1972 the Christiana location opened its doors.

The first resident: James P. Harrison, SR. James’ father, and Katherine’s father-in-law.

Since opening the first facility, the Harrison family has opened four other locations focusing on senior living, assisted living, skilled nursing, rehabilitation and memory care services.

Today we are a third generation of caregivers who remain steadfastly committed to providing our residents with the very best in healthcare and senior living services, so their families can have peace of mind.

Our residents enjoy:

Independent living so you or your family member can enjoy the freedom from the of upkeep of a home or condo

Professional experienced staff so you can have peace of mind knowing exceptional care is given at all times at all our locations

Vibrant, active living so you or your family member can enjoy a variety of activities and form friendships to enhance and enjoy life

A home like atmosphere so you and your family have the comfort and ease of a relaxed environment with superior care

Learn more about the services we offer and our locations here.
